GSD.description:
ax25: improve the incomplete fix to avoid UAF and NPD bugs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.231 by commit 3072e72814de56f3c674650a8af98233ddf78b19. For more details please see the references link.
